<size=24>Description</size>
This mod is an expansion of the "Minerals" Mod and the "Minerals" mod be enabled and must come before in the loading order. It adds more mineral diversity, including many gemstones.
See: https://github.com/zachary-foster/MineralsExtra for detailed documentation.
